Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1941 affecting package protobuf for versions less than 3.17.3-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-1941 affecting package protobuf for versions less than 3.17.3-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package protobuf is earlier than 3.17.3-3, affected by CVE-2022-1941
